stateNames.name: Stages
stateNames.hint: An array of descriptions shown to players, arranged from worst to best possible health.

deathState.name: Separate Death State
deathState.hint: Show a separate description for dead tokens (currently denoted with full-token skull mark).

deathStateName.name: Death State Name
deathStateName.hint: The description shown to players when the token is dead.

color.name: Color
color.hint: Should the descriptions be highlighted with a gradient from green to red corresponding to current health?

smoothGradient.name: Smooth Gradient
smoothGradient.hint: With this setting off the color will only change when the next description is reached, with it on it will reflect the health percentage.
